content.text:
## Analysis of the Main Target Image

The target structure consists of two connected constructions that together form a complex building block arrangement. I'll describe each part separately.

### Left Tower Structure:
- Has 3 main layers vertically
- Bottom layer: Red block with circular hole (block #1), with yellow rectangular platform (block #7) on top
- Middle layer: Two green vertical rectangular blocks (blocks #5 and #6) with a yellow rectangular platform (block #7) on top
- Top layer: Yellow rectangular platform (block #7) with an orange triangular prism (block #14) on top

### Right Complex Structure:
- Has a base: Green rectangular block (block #4) supporting an orange cylindrical column (block #10)
- Main framework: Three yellow horizontal platforms (blocks #7 and #8) connected by green vertical supports (blocks #5 and #6)
- Middle section: Contains an orange triangular prism (block #15)
- Top section: Has a green rectangular block (block #4) with a blue cube (block #3) on top

### Total Block Count:
The structure uses approximately 18 individual blocks of various types.

## Required Blocks from Dictionary

Based on my analysis, the following blocks are needed:
1. Red block with circular hole (index 1)
2. Blue cube (index 3)
3. Green horizontal rectangular blocks (index 4) - used 3 times
4. Green vertical rectangular blocks (index 5) - used 2 times 
5. Green vertical rectangular blocks (index 6) - used 2 times
6. Yellow horizontal rectangular blocks (index 7) - used 3 times
7. Yellow horizontal rectangular blocks (index 8) - used 1 time
8. Orange vertical cylinder (index 10) - used 1 time
9. Orange triangular prism in orientation #14 - used 1 time
10. Orange triangular prism in orientation #15 - used 1 time

## Assembly Order

```
{
   Step1: Move block with index 4 (green horizontal base for right structure)
   Step2: Move block with index 10 (orange vertical cylinder)
   Step3: Move block with index 7 (bottom yellow platform of right structure)
   Step4: Move block with index 5 (left green vertical support in right structure)
   Step5: Move block with index 6 (right green vertical support in right structure)
   Step6: Move block with index 7 (middle yellow platform of right structure)
   Step7: Move block with index 15 (orange triangular prism in right structure)
   Step8: Move block with index 5 (left green vertical support in upper right structure)
   Step9: Move block with index 6 (right green vertical support in upper right structure)
   Step10: Move block with index 8 (top yellow platform of right structure)
   Step11: Move block with index 4 (green block on top of right structure)
   Step12: Move block with index 3 (blue cube at the very top)
   Step13: Move block with index 1 (red block with circular hole for left structure)
   Step14: Move block with index 7 (yellow platform above red block)
   Step15: Move block with index 5 (left green vertical support in left structure)
   Step16: Move block with index 6 (right green vertical support in left structure)
   Step17: Move block with index 7 (top yellow platform of left structure)
   Step18: Move block with index 14 (orange triangular prism at top of left structure)
}
```
